channel.title: Help with full working range
channel.description:
I've had the same problem for quite some time, and I've searched for it, but so far haven't seen any solution.
Does anyone know how to get range to work fully and properly?
All my range weapons work by strength bonus instead of range, which is fine i guess.
But more importantly, I can't get it so you shoot your ranged weapon from a distance. The character ALWAYS runs up to the target. It's hella annoying
Any help with this would be tight.

item.title: Help with full working range

item.description:
